name: Devilish Wiles
summary: Traditionally, fiends are exceptionally good at persuading people to do things, even when their targets know it's a bad idea.
description:
Traditionally, fiends are exceptionally good at persuading people to do things, even when their targets know it's a bad idea. You're also rather good at it, compelling the weak and weak-willed to your bidding. You can cast charm once per day as a 1st-level divine innate spell.Traits

Tiefling: A creature with this trait has the tiefling versatile heritage. Tieflings are planar scions descended from fiends. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by tieflings.
